name: michaelzhan.me
description: My personal website (the one you're on right now!). Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS.

name: Conway's Game of Life
description: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life in C++. Uses gtkmm-3.0 for graphics.

name: bioRxiv Newsletter
description: A weekly newsletter service that retrieves and sends users latest bioRxiv preprints based on their search. Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, using the bioRxiv API.

name: Book Recommender
description: A bookshelf and recommender service with user authentication, using Google Books API. Built with Next.js, NextAuth, and Tailwind CSS.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple multiplayer tic-tac-toe game. Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, using Socket.IO and an Express.js backend for real-time communication.

name: FairShare
description: A web app that tracks expenses for groups and calculates how to split bills. Built with base JavaScript and HTML/CSS on a Flask backend.

name: Weather App
description: A weather app that displays the current weather for a user-chosen location. Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, using the OpenWeatherMap API.
